successes.title: BESIDE STILL WATERS: A Chris Lowell Film
successes.description: A movie about drinking and dancing. Laughter and secrets. Sex, drugs, mischief and regret. A movie about friendship.

Pledges.description: You'll receive access to hours of exclusive "Backer Only" content through this Kickstarter page. WELCOME TO THE BSW FAMILY!

In addition to our ETERNAL GRATITUDE, we'll send you a SPECIAL SCRIPT annotated with doodles, jokes, and fun little anecdotes from set.  You'll also receive a private link to CHRIS AND BECK'S (SNL) NEVER-BEFORE-SEEN FIRST STUDENT FILM - "Rebel Without a Bra" - which also features Nick Rutherford and Kyle Mooney of GoodNeighbor!
35@35 LIMITED SPECIAL - TWO FILMS: Thirty-five of you can get the BESIDE STILL WATERS DVD + a private link to Chris/Beck's first student film, and an annotated script from writers Chris/Mo.

SET PHOTOS • DVD • STUDENT FILM - We'll send you a DVD OF THE FILM and EXCLUSIVE PHOTOS FROM SET!  See the movie you brought to life!  Screen it for your friends, and rub their noses in your clearly exquisite taste in independent cinema.  Especially Lisa... Smug little Lisa...
You'll also receive a private link to Chris/Beck's first student film, and an annotated script from writers Chris/Mo.
(For all you awesome Lisas out there, we meant the other Lisa)
BLU-RAY • SET PHOTOS • STUDENT FILM • SCRIPT- We've added a Blu-Ray option. Get everything from the $50 reward, but a Blu-Ray instead of a DVD.

T-SHIRT • VOICEMAIL • DVD • STUDENT FILM • SCRIPT-                                              You'll get a limited edition T-SHIRT DESIGNED BY CHRIS!  And honestly,  it looks great on you.  No, I'm not just saying that - it really brings out your eyes.  You'll also get and  a PERSONALIZED VOICEMAIL from Chris or a member of the cast!  Plus, you'll get a DVD of the movie, a private link to Chris/Beck's first student film, and an annotated script from writers Chris/Mo.
BSW IS GOING GLOBAL!  This is the international shipping option for our $100 prize package.

POETRY • ORIGINAL ART • WHISKEY SLAPS • T-SHIRT • DVD • STUDENT FILM • SCRIPT - You can't say we're not willing to suffer for our art - Chris, Mo or a member of the cast, will send you a PERSONALIZED WHISKEY SLAP VIDEO, dedicating the slap to you!  You'll also receive an ORIGINAL POEM from Chris with YOUR NAME in it, and a SPECIAL WATERCOLOR PRINT from the film by artist Carla Weeks!  Plus, you'll get a limited edition T-Shirt, a DVD of the movie, a private link to Chris/Beck's first student film, and an annotated script from writers Chris/Mo!!!
BSW IS GOING GLOBAL!  This is the international shipping option for our $250 prize package.

OWN A PIECE OF BESIDE STILL WATERS - We shot this movie on beautiful 16mm film, and we will actually send you a piece of it!  Own a portion of the film!  We'll also send you a custom BESIDE STILL WATERS JOURNAL, with an original, signed, exclusive SHORT STORY by Chris.  This movie grew out of our personal stories, and we'd love for you to start writing yours.  Plus, you'll receive a beautiful watercolor print from the film by artist Carla Weeks, a limited edition T-Shirt, a DVD of the movie, a private link to Chris/Beck's first student film, and an annotated script from writers Chris/Mo.

EARLY BIRD SPECIAL - The ultimate package for fans of Chris's fine art photography - A SIGNED, EDITIONED, FIBER PRINT, a personal note from Chris describing the print, and a ONE-OF-A-KIND UNDEVELOPED ROLL OF FILM shot by Chris just for you!  Plus, you'll receive a beautiful watercolor print from the film by artist Carla Weeks, a limited edition T-Shirt, a DVD of the movie, a private link to Chris/Beck's first student film, and an annotated script from writers Chris/Mo.

PHOTOBOOK - ONLY AVAILABLE THROUGH THIS KICKSTARTER - Chris is designing a hardback, premium luster paper COFFEE TABLE BOOK (approx 100 pgs) filled with photographs from the original Georgia lakehouse, taken during his final 31 days there.  These images truly capture the place and people that inspired BSW.  Chris will also include a HANDWRITTEN, PERSONALIZED NOTE to thank you for your support and generosity.  Plus, you'll receive a beautiful watercolor print from the film by artist Carla Weeks, a limited edition T-Shirt, a DVD of the movie, a private link to Chris/Beck's first student film, and an annotated script from writers Chris/Mo.

The ultimate package for fans of Chris's fine art photography - A SIGNED, EDITIONED, FIBER PRINT, a personal note from Chris describing the print, and a ONE-OF-A-KIND UNDEVELOPED ROLL OF FILM shot by Chris just for you!  Plus, you'll receive a beautiful watercolor print from the film by artist Carla Weeks, a limited edition T-Shirt, a DVD of the movie, a private link to Chris/Beck's first student film, and an annotated script from writers Chris/Mo.

EARLY BIRD SPECIAL - You'll receive a 'SPECIAL THANKS' CREDIT in the film because, hey, we couldn't have done it without you.  You'll also get 2 tickets to a SPECIAL VIP SCREENING of Beside Still Waters in NY/LA, where you'll meet Chris, Mo, and the cast, and listen to them applaud furiously when your name appears in the credits!  Plus, we'll send you a beautiful watercolor print from the film by artist Carla Weeks, a limited edition T-Shirt, a DVD of the movie, a private link to Chris/Beck's first student film, and an annotated script from writers Chris/Mo.
(Travel and lodging not included.  Cast attendance subject to availability.)

You'll receive a 'SPECIAL THANKS' CREDIT in the film because, hey, we couldn't have done it without you.  You'll also get 2 tickets to a SPECIAL VIP SCREENING of Beside Still Waters in NY/LA, where you'll meet Chris, Mo, and the cast, and listen to them applaud furiously when your name appears in the credits!  Plus, we'll send you a beautiful watercolor print from the film by artist Carla Weeks, a limited edition T-Shirt, a DVD of the movie, a private link to Chris/Beck's first student film, and an annotated script from writers Chris/Mo.
(Travel and lodging not included.  Cast attendance subject to availability.)

CHRIS LOWELL IS TAKING YOU TO LUNCH!  (No, that's not a metaphor).  Enjoy your delicious entrée as he gushes over how you've helped make his directorial debut a reality.  Of course you can have one of his french fries.  He doesn't mind.  You'll also receive 2 tickets to a special VIP screening with Chris, Mo, and the cast, a beautiful watercolor print from the film by artist Carla Weeks, a limited edition T-Shirt, a DVD of the movie, a private link to Chris/Beck's first student film, and an annotated script from writers Chris/Mo.
